title: Presentation of the Regulations made by the Minister of Sports under Section 34 (1) of the Convention against Doping in Sports Act, No.33 of 2013, in Parliament
decision_details: - The proposal made by Hon. Dayasiri Jayasekara, the Minister of Sports, to present the Regulations published in the Gazette (Extraordinary) Notification No.1950/1 dated 2016-01-18, made under Section 34(1) of the Convention against Doping in Sports Act, No.33 of 2013, in Parliament for approval, was approved by the Cabinet.
